channel.title: Comments on: X# a domain specific language designed to quickly create Web applications and services

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: Well I'd only have to debug it once, as I imagine it serves a jsp type page and not one of those godforsaken applets :P
item.content:encoded: Well I’d only have to debug it once, as I imagine it serves a jsp type page and not one of those godforsaken applets ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
>>I don’t think I feel like setting up a webserver to run java

You don’t like “Write once, debug everywhere”?

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: It looks pretty cool to me. I'd love to try it, but I don't think I feel like setting up a webserver to run java
item.content:encoded: It looks pretty cool to me. I’d love to try it, but I don’t think I feel like setting up a webserver to run java
